sentences.en: As I sidestepped, the bottle hit me on the left hip.
sentences.cn: 我侧一步要躲闪的时候，瓶子打中了我的左髋部。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: For more information concerning the club contact I. Coldwell.
sentences.cn: 咨询俱乐部详情，请与I.科德维尔联系。

sentences.en: I don't see the point in it really. It's just stupid.
sentences.cn: 我真的不理解这到底有什么意义，简直是愚蠢透顶。

sentences.en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentences.cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

sentences.en: I feel it's done me good to get it off my chest.
sentences.cn: 我感觉吐吐苦水对我有好处。

sentences.en: I had obtained the authentic details about the birth of the organization.
sentences.cn: 我已经掌握了有关该组织诞生的可靠的详细资料。

sentences.en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentences.cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentences.en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
I know it's nothing serious and I feel quite unemotional about it.
sentences.cn: 我知道那根本没什么大不了的，所以有些无动于衷。

sentences.en: I moved to this city six years ago.
sentences.cn: 六年前我搬到了这个城市。

sentences.en: I thought you might like to read the enclosed.
sentences.cn: 我想你或许想要读一下信封里的内容。

sentences.en: I try to remember all the good times I've had here.
sentences.cn: 我试着回忆在这里度过的所有美好时光。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: I’m not late again, am I?
It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentences.en: My husband and I enjoy going to the theatre.
sentences.cn: 我和丈夫喜欢去剧院看戏。

sentences.en: The company I work for went through a rough patch.
sentences.cn: 我所在的公司经历了一段困难时期。

phrases.phrase: dot the i's and cross the t's

trans.tran_cn: 碘元素，英语字母表中第九个字母，罗马数字1

trans.tran_en: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself
